lines.name: Voideye

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Gems

lines.flavourText: The darker the eye, the more diligent the watched.

lines.name: Berek's Grip

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-36)% increased Cold Damage
Adds 1 to (1-84) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
+(30-46) to maximum Life
(1-1.2)% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies
1% of Damage against Frozen Enemies Leeched as Life
1% of Damage Leeched as Energy Shield against Frozen Enemies
1% of Damage Leeched as Mana against Frozen Enemies
1% of Damage against Shocked Enemies Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
"Berek hid from Storm's lightning wrath
In the embrace of oblivious Frost
Repelled by ice, blinded by blizzards
Storm raged in vain
While Berek slept."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: The Druggery

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-36) to all Attributes
(15-25)% increased Flask Charges gained
(10-20)% increased Flask Charges used
(10-20)% increased Flask Effect Duration
Life Flasks gain 1 Charge every 3 seconds
100% of Life Recovery from Flasks is applied to nearby Allies instead of You

lines.flavourText:
"This will help with the pain.
One for you... and one for me."
- Doctor 'Shaky Hands' Opden

lines.name: Bloodsoaked Medallion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+(50-70) to maximum Life
+(17-34)% to Chaos Resistance

Every 10 seconds:
Gain 2% of Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks for 5 seconds
Gain 5% of Life per Enemy Killed for 5 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"Atziri ordained that we exploit the weaknesses inherent in our slaves.
With relish, we did exactly as she instructed."
- Guatelitzi, Architect of Flesh

lines.name: Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-19) to (7-38) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (2-14) to (5-33) Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to (13-81) Lightning Damage to Attacks
+(6-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills during any Flask Effect
(10-12)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle

lines.name: The Aylardex

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-60) to maximum Life
+(50-81) to maximum Mana
+1 to Maximum Power Charges
(10-12)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge
(80-100)% increased Power Charge Duration
1% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life per Power Charge
40% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
Shackled fires dance about;
Might within from force without.

lines.name: Mutewind Seal

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have (20-21)% increased Attack and Cast Speed
Gain Onslaught for 10 seconds when you Cast Socketed Golem Skill
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 13 Faster Attacks
+(2-3) to Level of Socketed Golem Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 16 Minion Speed
Adds (5-12) to (11-18) Physical Damage to Attacks
(5-12)% increased Attack Speed
(1-5)% increased Movement Speed
(1-5)% chance to Dodge Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
When a fallen leader's body is taken to the funeral peak,
those who seek power must ascend together.
One returns with the seal. 
The rest do not return at all.

lines.name: Shaper's Seed

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (30-120)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
Regenerate (2-4.8)% of Life per second
Nearby Allies gain (1-4)% of Life Regenerated per second
Nearby Allies gain (40-80)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

lines.flavourText: The first light to grow in the primordial darkness.

lines.name: Tasalio's Sign

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 15 Physical Damage to Attacks against Frozen Enemies
Adds (5-12) to (7-24) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
50% chance to Avoid being Chilled
+(200-300) to Evasion Rating
20% reduced Chill Duration on you
(5-12)% chance to Freeze
Adds (40-48) to (60-72) Cold Damage against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Tasalio, God of Water,
to the chieftain Rakiata.
Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand
so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

lines.name: Timeclasp

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-18)% increased Attack Speed
(5-18)% increased Cast Speed
+(10-45) to maximum Energy Shield
15% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
15% reduced Mana Regeneration Rate
(6-12)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
Temporal Chains has (30-59)% reduced Effect on you
(1-20)% reduced Skill Effect Duration
(1-20)% increased Skill Effect Duration
(6-14)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life
Unaffected by Temporal Chains

lines.flavourText:
"To us mere mortals, time is slippery. 
I'm just evening things out." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Gluttony

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 30 Poacher's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
Trigger Level 30 Poacher's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy and have no Mark
You have Culling Strike against Cursed Enemies
+(60-96) to maximum Life
Curse Enemies with Level 30 Poacher's Mark on Hit, which can apply to Hexproof Enemies
Culling Strike against Enemies Cursed with Poacher's Mark
(20-32) Life gained for each Cursed Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (20-32) Life per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
(10-16) Mana gained for each Cursed Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (10-14) Mana per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Take (100-200) Physical Damage when you use a Movement Skill
You have no Armour or Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
What started as a desire to feed
became a desire to learn...

lines.name: Siegebreaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (6-12)% increased maximum Energy Shield
(6-12)% increased maximum Life
+(17-23)% to Chaos Resistance
Minions have (5-6)% chance to Taunt on Hit with Attacks
Your Minions spread Caustic Ground on Death, dealing (20-24)% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Poison the land and they'll have nothing to defend.

lines.name: Doedre's Damning

explicitModifiers.text: +(5-20) to Intelligence
+(5-24)% to all Elemental Resistances
+(5-6) Mana gained on Kill
Gain (5-20) Mana per Enemy Killed
You can apply an additional Curse

lines.flavourText:
Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

lines.name: Faminebind

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-36)% to Cold Resistance
20% increased Projectile Damage
30% reduced Flask Charges gained
60% increased Flask Effect Duration
Deals 50 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies

lines.flavourText:
After the Great Fire, the land lay barren
and our forefathers grew weak.
Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

lines.name: Maligaro's Restraint

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (30-60) Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% increased Shock Duration on you
Shocks you cause are reflected back to you
60% increased Damage while Shocked
(15-16)% increased Movement Speed while Shocked

lines.flavourText:
"Our genius will pave the way forward.
May all who are worthy be improved!"
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: The Ascetic

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Rarity of Items found with a Normal Item Equipped
(10-15)% increased Quantity of Items found with a Magic Item Equipped

lines.flavourText: Many things come to one who has nothing.

lines.name: Perquil's Toe

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-60) to Dexterity
(5-8)% increased Movement Speed
Lightning Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Lucky
Lightning Damage from Enemies Hitting you is Lucky
Nearby Allies' Damage with Hits is Lucky

lines.flavourText: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

lines.name: Icefang Orbit

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-36) to Dexterity
25% chance to Poison on Hit
(40-72)% increased Damage with Poison
You are Chilled when you are Poisoned
Non-Chilled Enemies you Poison are Chilled
Poisoned Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
Those members of the Brotherhood who employ the venom of 
Trarthan ice snakes must take great care with the volatile substance.

lines.name: Extractor Mentis

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-60) to Strength
Recover 1% of Life on Kill
5% chance to grant Onslaught to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Unholy Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
(5-10)% chance to gain Onslaught for 10 seconds on Kill
(5-10)% chance to gain Unholy Might for 10 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
When slaughtered flesh falls silent,
the soul may yet scream on.

lines.name: Stone of Lazhwar

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (12-15)% Chance to Block Spell Damage
(10-20)% increased Cast Speed
+(30-70) to maximum Mana

lines.flavourText:
You are slow, foolish and ignorant.
I am not.

lines.name: Retaliation Charm

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
(25-40)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
(30-50)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies
(40-50)% chance to Blind Enemies on Critical Strike
Blind does not affect your Light Radius
(10-20)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Blinded
Blind you inflict is Reflected to you

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.

lines.name: The Highwayman

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% increased Rarity of Items found
1% of Damage Leeched as Life
25% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
(5-12)% increased Movement Speed
0.5% of Damage Leeched as Life while you have at least 5 total Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charges
Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled

lines.flavourText: Somebody does have to get hurt.

lines.name: Sibyl's Lament

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-18) to (20-33) Fire Damage to Attacks
(10-40)% reduced Rarity of Items found
Left ring slot: (30-80)% reduced Reflected Elemental Damage taken
Left ring slot: You and your Minions take (30-80)% reduced Reflected Elemental Damage
Right ring slot: (30-80)% reduced Reflected Physical Damage taken
Right ring slot: You and your Minions take (30-80)% reduced Reflected Physical Damage
(20-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
The portrait reflected his pain,
a pain that she could never see.

lines.name: Sidhebreath

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +25% to Cold Resistance
(0.2-0.24)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Minions have (10-18)% increased maximum Life
Minions convert 50% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage
Minions have (10-15)% increased Movement Speed
Minions deal (5-35) to (11-70) additional Cold Damage
Minions deal (10-15)% increased Damage
Minions deal no Non-Cold Damage
(10-18)% reduced Mana Cost of Minion Skills

lines.flavourText: The breath of life is yours to give.

lines.name: Thief's Torment

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-25)% increased Quantity of Items found
Can't use other Rings
+(8-48)% to all Elemental Resistances
+(20-72) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (20-72) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
+(15-36) Mana gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (15-36) Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
(50-60)% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText:
The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.
